channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Avatar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Avatar

item.title: CVE-2023-4798|2023-10-16T19:39:09.545Z -- unknown -- user%20avatar
item.description: The User Avatar WordPress plugin before 1.2.2 does not properly sanitize and escape certain of its shortcodes attributes, which could allow relatively low-privileged users like contributors to conduct Stored XSS attacks.
